channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Victims of Reno casino shooting include 2 men visiting for a bachelor party, police say

item.title: Arkansas police arrest man in Devil's Den park killings after dayslong search, finding him nearby

item.title: Islamic State and al-Qaida threat is intense in Africa, with growing risks in Syria, UN experts say

item.title: Asian shares are mixed after South Korea makes tariff deal and US stocks fall
item.description: Asian shares are mixed after most U.S. stocks slipped, as doubts rose on Wall Street about whether the Federal Reserve will deliver economy-juicing cu...

item.title: Nebraska plant explosion killed 2 girls and an employee
item.description: Officials have confirmed that two girls and a relative died in an explosion at a Nebraska biofuels plant
